detaileddescription.para: The following are HS subsystem requirements. Detailed requirements can be found in the Health and Safety Application Requirements Document.

CFS-510: The CFS shall monitor application execution and take the appropriate action if one or more monitored applications fails to execute. CFS-511: The CFS shall monitor all event messages, looking for monitored events and taking the appropriate action. CFS-512: The CFS shall maintain the watchdog timer. CFS-513: The CFS shall monitor and report the CPU Aliveness.
Next: Health and Safety Deployment Guide Prev: Health and Safety Operation
